translations: 怀偏见的；有成见的；偏颇的
损害（prejudice 的过去分词）；使抱偏见

sentences.sentence: Few people will admit to being racially prejudiced.
sentences.translation: 很少有人会承认自己有种族偏见。

sentences.sentence: Some landlords and landladies are racially prejudiced.
I never stick too long to one ship; one gets narrow-minded and prejudiced.
sentences.translation: 我从不在一艘船上停留太久；那样会让一个人变得心胸狭窄，有偏见。
